title: Kunji
desc: Delivered a professional level product to an international client by working with three other developers in an AGILE/SCRUM team. Developed a full-stack website with user and admin capabilities. Users can enter their information and receive location-based results. Information can be sent via email, SMS, or WhatsApp. Admin can manage user information and add, delete and update NGO data.
tech: React, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, Render, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, reCAPTCHA, Twilio API, SendGrid API
tools: Git, GitHub, Slack, Zoom, Figma, Postman

title: Class Planner
desc: Contributed as a member of an Agile Scrum team, responsible for developing and delivering front-end and back-end applications to meet the needs of the users and the organization. Collaborated with the Product Team to build impactful features that support the day-to-day operations of CYF, utilizing Agile methodologies to ensure the efficient and effective delivery of high-quality software solutions.
tech: React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, AWS, HTML, CSS(SASS), JavaScript, Docker,Swagger Bootstrap

title: Christian Chat AI
desc: ChristianChatAI is an innovative website that combines the wisdom of the Holy Scriptures with the power of AI technology. Engage in meaningful religious discussions from Orthodox, Catholic, and Protestant perspectives, and deepen your faith in an inclusive and interactive community of like-minded believers.
tech: React, Node.js, Express, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Open AI API
